summary: An ordinance approving assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2124 for improvement of North and West 74th Street, from Winona Avenue to 8th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21218, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof
